entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING IN EFFECT, St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:17 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then east 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016
